name: Cloudy with A Chance of Recyclables
name_original: Cloudy with A Chance of Recyclables
description:
The year is 2028. Climate change has worsened. There's not enough landfill to dispose of our waste. So, the brightest minds suggested we throw it into space. There's where it went wrong.  You are the world’s last chance of reducing the impact of climate change. Catch as much garbage as you can using the correct garbage bin within the allocated time. Move left or right using your keyboard arrows <- -> to catch the falling garbage items. Beware the rate of garbage items falling down could increase without any warning! 

(A metaphor of how the waste we produce would overwhelm our efforts to fix things).
